data.eml:eml: A new species of freshwater crab of the genus Sodhiana Yeo & Ng, 2012 (Decapoda: Brachyura: Gecarcinucidae) from southern Iran

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sharifian, Sana, Kamrani, Ehsan, Sharifian, Salim (2014): A new species of freshwater crab of the genus Sodhiana Yeo & Ng, 2012 (Decapoda: Brachyura: Gecarcinucidae) from southern Iran. Zootaxa 3878 (5): 485-490, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3878.5.7
